raw_text: Mann and Yarowsky (2003) have proposed a Web based clustering technique relying on a feature space combining biographic facts and associated names, whereas Bagga and Baldwin (1998) have looked for co reference chains within each document, take the context of these chains for creating summaries about each entity and convert these summaries into a bag of words
clean_text: Mann and Yarowsky (2003) have proposed a Web based clustering technique relying on a feature space combining biographic facts and associated names, whereas Bagga and Baldwin (1998) have looked for co reference chains within each document, take the context of these chains for creating summaries about each entity and convert these summaries into a bag of words.
